```kt
    LOCAL_PATH := $(call my-dir)
    include $(CLEAR_VARS)
    LOCAL_MODULE    := hello
    LOCAL_SRC_FILES := hello.c
    include $(BUILD_SHARED_LIBRARY)
    ```
